import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./Main.css"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; export const Main = () => { const [currentSlide, setCurrentSlide] = useState(0); const [spotlightIndex, setSpotlightIndex] = useState(0); // Function to handle left button click for New Arrival const handleClickLeft = () => { setCurrentSlide((prevSlide) => (prevSlide === 0 ? 4 : prevSlide - 1)); }; // Function to handle right button click for New Arrival const handleClickRight = () => { setCurrentSlide((prevSlide) => (prevSlide === 3 ? 0 : prevSlide + 1)); }; // Function to handle left button click for Spotlight const handleSpotlightLeft = () => { setSpotlightIndex((prevIndex) => (prevIndex === 0 ? 4 : prevIndex - 1)); }; // Function to handle right button click for Spotlight const handleSpotlightRight = () => { setSpotlightIndex((prevIndex) => (prevIndex === 3 ? 0 : prevIndex + 1)); }; return ( <> {/* Spotlight Section */}
